name: add-stamp
description: A Nuxt 3 application for applying watermarks to images using WebAssembly (WASM) for high-performance image processing

scripts.build:wasm: cd wasm && wasm-pack build --target web --out-dir pkg --out-name image_stamper && cd .. && if not exist public\wasm mkdir public\wasm && xcopy /Y /E wasm\pkg\* public\wasm\
scripts.copy:wasm: if not exist public\wasm mkdir public\wasm && xcopy /Y /E wasm\pkg\* public\wasm\
scripts.dev:wasm: npm run build:wasm && npm run dev
scripts.clean:wasm: if exist wasm\pkg rmdir /s /q wasm\pkg && if exist public\wasm\*.js del /q public\wasm\*.js && if exist public\wasm\*.wasm del /q public\wasm\*.wasm && if exist public\wasm\*.d.ts del /q public\wasm\*.d.ts
